panels.description: Active + idle in transaction user sessions

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  coalesce(avg((data->>'active')::int8 + (data->>'idleintransaction')::int8), 0) as active
from backends
  where dbname = '$dbname'
  and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  coalesce(avg(active), 0) as "active -$lag_interval"
from (
select
  time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time,
  (data->>'active')::int8 + (data->>'idleintransaction')::int8 as active
from backends
  where dbname = '$dbname'
  and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
) x
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Active sessions

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((c - c_lag + r - r_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "TPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((c - c_lag + r - r_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "TPS-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time, lag(time) over w + '$lag_interval'::interval as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "QPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from stat_statements_calls
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((c - c_lag + r - r_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "QPS-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time, lag(time) over w + '$lag_interval'::interval as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  time,
  avg(avg) as "avg_query_runtime"
from (

select
$__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
queryid,
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
          time
        from stat_statements
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and not tag_data->>'query' like '%$2)::int8 as epoch_ns,%' /*trying to not include queries by pgwatch itself*/
        window w as (partition by tag_data->>'queryid' order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

select
  time,
  avg(avg) as "avg_query_runtime-$lag_interval"
from (

select
$__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
queryid,
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from stat_statements
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        and not tag_data->>'query' like '%$2)::int8 as epoch_ns,%' /*trying to not include queries by pgwatch itself*/
        window w as (partition by tag_data->>'queryid' order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((wal-wal_lag) / (etime-lag_etime)) as "WAL rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8 as wal, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8) over w as wal_lag,
          extract(epoch from time) as etime,
          lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w as lag_etime,
          time
        from wal
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where wal >= wal_lag and etime - lag_etime > 0
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((wal-wal_lag) / (etime-lag_etime)) as "WAL rate-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8 as wal, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8) over w as wal_lag,
          extract(epoch from time + '$lag_interval'::interval) as etime,
          lag(extract(epoch from time + '$lag_interval'::interval)) over w as lag_etime,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from wal
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where wal >= wal_lag and etime - lag_etime > 0
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((ins-ins_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "INSERT"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_inserted')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'tup_inserted')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ins >= ins_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((ins-ins_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "INSERT-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_inserted')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'tup_inserted')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time, lag(time) over w + '$lag_interval'::interval as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ins >= ins_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((upd-upd_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "UPDATE"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_updated')::int8 as upd, lag((data->>'tup_updated')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where upd >= upd_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((upd-upd_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "UPDATE-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_updated')::int8 as upd, lag((data->>'tup_updated')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time, lag(time) over w + '$lag_interval'::interval as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where upd >= upd_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((del-del_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "delATE"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_deleted')::int8 as del, lag((data->>'tup_deleted')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where del >= del_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg(((del-del_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "DELETE-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_deleted')::int8 as del, lag((data->>'tup_deleted')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time, lag(time) over w + '$lag_interval'::interval as time_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where del >= del_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  time,
  sum(seq_scan) as seq_scan
from (
  select
    $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
    table_full_name,
    avg((((scan - scan_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))) as seq_scan
  from (
          select 
            (data->>'seq_scan')::int8 as scan, lag((data->>'seq_scan')::int8) over w as scan_lag,
            time, lag(time) over w as time_lag,
            tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name
          from table_stats
          where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
          and (data->>'table_size_b')::int8  > 1e8
          window w as (partition by tag_data->>'table_full_name' order by time)        
    ) x
    where scan >= scan_lag and time > time_lag
    group by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

select
  time,
  sum(seq_scan) as "seq_scan-$lag_interval"
from (
  select
    $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
    table_full_name,
    avg((((scan - scan_lag) * (extract(epoch from '$agg_interval'::interval))) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))) as seq_scan
  from (
          select 
            (data->>'seq_scan')::int8 as scan, lag((data->>'seq_scan')::int8) over w as scan_lag,
            time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time, lag(time) over w + '$lag_interval'::interval as time_lag,
            tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name
          from table_stats
          where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
          and (data->>'table_size_b')::int8  > 1e8
          window w as (partition by tag_data->>'table_full_name' order by time)        
    ) x
    where scan >= scan_lag and time > time_lag
    group by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(tb-tb_lag) as "Temp bytes"
from (
      select 
          time,
          lag(time) over w as time_lag,        
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb,
          lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(tb-tb_lag) as "Temp bytes -$lag_interval"
from (
      select 
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time,
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb,
          lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((hit-hit_lag)::numeric / ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag)))*100 as "SB hit ratio"
from (
        select
          time,
          (data->>'blks_hit')::int8 as hit, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::int8) over w as hit_lag,
          (data->>'blks_read')::int8 as read, lag((data->>'blks_read')::int8) over w as read_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hit > hit_lag or read > read_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((hit-hit_lag)::numeric / ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag)))*100 as "SB hit ratio -$lag_interval"
from (
        select
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time,
          (data->>'blks_hit')::int8 as hit, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::int8) over w as hit_lag,
          (data->>'blks_read')::int8 as read, lag((data->>'blks_read')::int8) over w as read_lag
        from db_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hit > hit_lag or read > read_lag
group by 1
order by 1

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics ORDER BY 1;
list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics ORDER BY 1;
